title: Every Lipstick Worn at the Golden Globes 2017

persons.name: kerry washington getty images natalie portman for portman

organizations.name: becca beach tint lip shimmer soufflés
dior addict lipstick in ultra dior
covergirl queen collection soft matte lip color
laura mercier velour lovers lip colour

text: Makeup Every Lipstick Worn at the Golden Globes 2017 Bright reds, custom pinks, and subversive browns; we got the inside scoop on the hottest lipstick shades of the night. January 9, 2017 Tracee Ellis Ross We think Ellis Ross may have just found her perfect shade of red. To create the bold orange-red hue, makeup artist Jamie Greenberg blended L’Oreal Paris Infallible Lip Paint in #322 and #324 on her hand before applying it on the lips. Kerry Washington Getty Images Natalie Portman For Portman's custom pinky-coral color, makeup artist Pati Dubroff applied Rouge Dior Lipstick in Opéra to create a stain, lined the mouth with Rouge Dior Lipliner in New World Matte , and added a bit of shine with Dior Addict Lipstick in Ultra Dior . Lily Collins Makeup artist Fiona Stiles used Lancôme L'Absolu Rouge in Souvenir to complete Collins' stunning all-red look. Sofia Vergara For Vergara's muted brown tone, makeup artist Kayleen McAdams swiped on CoverGirl Queen Collection Soft Matte Lip Color in Mauvejestic . Priyanka Chopra Priyanka Chopra's deep burgundy lip was one of the stand-out beauty moments of the night. To create the stunning hue, makeup artist Stephanie Brooke Barnes mixed Laura Mercier Velour Lovers Lip Colour in An Affair and Seduction. Getty Images Evan Rachel Wood Wood's pop of pink was the perfect accessory to her chic tuxedo . Makeup artist Toby Fleischman first prepped lips with, then finished the look with Burt's Bees Lipstick in Wine Wave , adding a hint of shine with a final layer of Burt's Bees Glossy Crayon in Outback Oasis . Chrissy Teigen Teigen's gorgeous rich red lip color color came courtesy of two Becca Beach Tint Lip Shimmer Soufflés that makeup artist Mary Philips blended together: Raspberry and Papaya. Getty Images Claire Foy The pale pink lip worn by the winner for Best Actress in a Television Series, Drama, was Giorgio Armani Rouge Ecstasy Lipstick in #508 . Hailee Steinfeld Sometimes all you need is a soft hit of pink to pull a look together. The key behind this subtle shade: a few swipes of Giorgio Armani Him/Her Lipcare in #125 topped with Giorgio Armani Rouge Ecstasy Lipstick in #104 . Anna Kendrick Makeup artist Vanessa Scali pressed Avon True Color Nourishing Lipstick in Berry Sangria onto Kendrick's lips, resulting in this sultry berry stain. Getty Images Mandy Moore Celebrity makeup artist Jenn Streicher mixed Laura Mercier Velour Lovers Lip Colour in Embrace and Indiscretion to achieve the perfect nude for Moore. She then dabbed a bit of the Velour Lovers Lip Colour in Aroused to the center of her lips for a just “bitten” look. Amy Adams Sometimes all you need is a swoosh of lip gloss to balance out dramatic smoky eyes. Case in point: makeup artist Stephen Solitto used only a few layers of Chantecaille Luminous Gloss in Coco —a pinky-taupe—to complete Adams' sexy look. Celebrity The Golden Globes are this weekend. Take a look back at some of the most surprising Golden Globes looks of all time. #
